Benchmark.title: Linux Root Zero UID XCCDF
Benchmark.description: This document defines a check that verifies the existence of only one user with a uid of 0. The check also verifies that the user with a uid of 0 is named root.

Group.title: Linux User Home Directory Rules
Group.description: Requirement relating to the root user being the sole possessor of a uid of 0.

Rule.title: GEN000880 - Root Zero UID
Rule.description: Ensure the root user is the only user with a uid of 0.

Rule.title: GEN000880 - Root Zero Uid - Fix Conflicts
Rule.description: Fix conflicts encountered upon checking the system.
Rule.fixtext: Verify within /etc/passwd that the root user is the only user with a uid of 0. Fix any conflicts encountered.
